title: New: Ant-Live – Freshman
body:
Photo by [Erika Braukis](http://www.flickr.com/photos/braukis/)

Seventy six seconds of music isn’t much to judge an artist upon, so I’m going to attempt to not make any overzealous or extrovert statements regarding **Ant-Live** and his debut ‘track’ _Freshman_. Opening with a **Public Enemy** sample, **Ant-Live** then settles into a smooth and intelligent flow, delivering in an almost freestyle manner. So that’s it, just over a minute, yet it’s long enough to have me on the edge of my seat, eagerly anticipating more.
